item.title: First
item.description: Holy crap! A post! A post? This is a test to see if I can deploy this thing, that the pages redner, and that text, code, and equations look okay. Lot’s more to come. Might burn it down and start over once all this is actually working. Here’s some code: def inc(x): return x + 1 Try collapsing this code block: python Click me! def inc(x): return x + 1 Here’s some math:
